nosub.title: Buy subscription to use Wisdom Treasures
nosub.subtitle: You do not currently have any active subscriptions. With a             subscription for Wisdom Treasures you will always have a word of wisdom             right at your hand, at any time.

store.q1: How do I get a subscription?
store.q1a: Click on the button above and continue to checkout
store.q2: When will my purchase be available?
store.q2a: Your purchase or access should be available as soon as your payment has been processed. This can take several minutes, but in most cases just a few seconds. If you experience any problems, feel free to contact us
store.q3a: No, you can buy a new subscription when the previous one is outdated
